everything is a tool. Go, Python, JS, C++, they are all tools. video_title: Why Java Is So Hard To Learn
comments: ['i cant even open the java control panelüò≠üò≠üò≠', "I just started to learn Java, now i see every where JAVA IS SO DIFFICULT sheessss i'll learn IT anyway üòÇ", '1:24', 'You don‚Äôt need a main to learn the very basics as that is just not how it‚Äôs taught in the book ‚ÄúObjects first with Java‚Äù where projects are provided and YouTube videos. BlueJ is handy to gain an understanding unlike other IDEs', 'I hate java i would rather code in kotlin than java but i have no choice but to learn it if I want to reverse engineering an android apps.', 'im at 0 knowledge in java your videos helped me up my game a bit thnx', 'errorsOfVideo.forEach(System.out::println);', "Or, you can be thrown into a java project with no java experience because the lead java coder left the project pissed off and there's only 4 months before everything goes into production. We all learn faster with a gun to our head. Thanks for the video!", "I disassembled compiled C++ programs to learn OOP. I learned more from my brief forays there than all the stupid analogies used in OOP training. Im sure you're probably laughing like a hyena, but thats what it took", 'I came to java from COBOL and was writing software in 5 days. Maybe its a skill issue. I learnt to code in assembly.', 'i think that java is easy to learn, the hard part its th OOP thats heavily attached to java.  the multilevels os abstractions are hard to learn, how to use them correctly much harder.', 'I felt like Java came crazy easy to me. But I have trouble with ‚Äúeasier‚Äùlanguages like Lua. It really all just comes down to preference and what makes sense to you.', 'As a python programmer had to say I can learn Java within a week in the interview. Sadly I have to follow what I said.', 'if you think java is hard, youre just dumb', "Java's syntax is really verbose and sometimes are a real mess, but eventuallt you'll get used to", "Let me correct your thumbnail \nJava is not hard it's trash üóëüöÆ", 'Young Dorothy Anderson Brian Wilson Amy', 'The java universe is  üî•üî•üî•', 'Subscribed just in case', "This didn't actually explain anything about why Java might be uniquely difficult (as the title implies), it was just about what could make programming difficult for self-taught beginners who have elected to start with an object-oriented programming language. The only possible takeaway as such is that Java *isn't* actually hard to learn... which is nice to know, but I expected a video with more/any substance :/"]
